div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 886 Rumania?, c. 1936 (122) Burial: c. 200-190 B.C. (T) Contents: 22+ AR Alexander III: late post. tetradr. (Hera- cleia Pont. 1, Pergamum 2, unc. Caria 1, Callatis 4, Mesembria 2, Dionyso- polis 1, Odessus 7, Cabyle 2, unc. Euxine 2) Disposition: New York 21 Listed in Noe under Balkans but Newell's record says Rumania
